segment.source: Use the Type of Application page to specify the type of application you are sequencing.
segment.target: Use the Type of Application page to specify the type of application you are sequencing.

segment.source: It is important to understand and select the correct type of application you are sequencing so you can ensure you take the correct steps toward successful package creation.
segment.target: It is important to understand and select the correct type of application you are sequencing so you can ensure you take the correct steps toward successful package creation.

segment.source: This page contains the following elements:
segment.target: This page contains the following elements:

segment.source: Select this option to create a package that contains an application or a suite of applications.
segment.target: Select this option to create a package that contains an application or a suite of applications.

segment.source: You should select this option for most applications you plan to sequence.
segment.target: You should select this option for most applications you plan to sequence.

segment.source: Select this option to create a package that extends the functionality of a standard application; for example, a plug-in for Microsoft Excel.
segment.target: Select this option to create a package that extends the functionality of a standard application; for example, a plug-in for Microsoft Excel.

segment.source: Select this option to create a package that is required by a standard application, for example, the Microsoft .NET Framework.
segment.target: Select this option to create a package that is required by a standard application, for example, the Microsoft .NET Framework.
